verses.verse: Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> went <S%H5375>on<s%> his <S%H7272>journey,<s%> and <S%H3212>came<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H6924>east.<s%>

He <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H875>behold,<s%> a well in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H7969>and,<s%> behold, three <S%H5739>flocks<s%> of <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H7257>lying<s%> there by <S%H875>it.<s%> For out of that well they <S%H8248>watered<s%> the <S%H5739>flocks.<s%> The <S%H68>stone<s%> on the <S%H875>well<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth<s%> was <S%H1419>large.<s%>

There all the <S%H5739>flocks<s%> were <S%H622>gathered.<s%> They <S%H1556>rolled<s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> from the <S%H875>well<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H8248>watered<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and <S%H7725>put<s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> on the <S%H875>well<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in its <S%H4725>place.<s%>
<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H251>them,<s%> "My relatives, <S%H370>where<s%> are you <S%H559>from?<s%>" They said, "We are from <S%H2771>Haran.<s%>"
He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3045>them,<s%> "Do you know <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor?<s%>" They <S%H559>said,<s%> "We know <S%H3045>him.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7965>them,<s%> "Is it well with <S%H559>him?<s%>" They said, "It is <S%H7965>well.<s%> <S%H7354>See,<s%> Rachel, his <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> is <S%H935>coming<s%> with the <S%H6629>sheep.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> it is still the <S%H1419>middle<s%> of the <S%H3117>day,<s%> not <S%H6256>time<s%> to gather the <S%H4735>livestock<s%> <S%H622>together.<s%> <S%H8248>Water<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and <S%H3212>go<s%> and feed <S%H7462>them.<s%>"

They <S%H559>said,<s%> "We <S%H3201>can<s%>'t, until all the <S%H5739>flocks<s%> are gathered <S%H622>together,<s%> and they <S%H1556>roll<s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> from the <S%H875>well<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> Then we <S%H8248>water<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep.<s%>"
While he was <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> with <S%H7354>them,<s%> Rachel <S%H935>came<s%> with her <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> for she kept <S%H7462>them.<s%>

It <S%H3290>happened,<s%> when Jacob <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H251>brother,<s%> and the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H251>brother,<s%> that <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> went <S%H5066>near,<s%> and <S%H1556>rolled<s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> from the <S%H875>well<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H8248>watered<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H251>brother.<s%>
<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5401>kissed<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel,<s%> and lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept.<s%>

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> that he was her <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H251>brother,<s%> and that he was <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%>'s <S%H1121>son.<s%> She <S%H7323>ran<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> her <S%H1>father.<s%>

It <S%H3837>happened,<s%> when Laban <S%H8085>heard<s%> the news of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> his <S%H269>sister<s%>'s <S%H1121>son,<s%> that he <S%H7323>ran<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H2263>embraced<s%> <S%H5401>him,<s%> and kissed <S%H935>him,<s%> and brought him to his <S%H1004>house.<s%> Jacob <S%H5608>told<s%> <S%H3837>Laban<s%> all these <S%H1697>things.<s%>
<S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H389>him,<s%> "Surely you are my <S%H6106>bone<s%> and my <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>" He <S%H3427>lived<s%> with him <S%H3117>for<s%> a <S%H2320>month.<s%>

<S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> "Because you are my <S%H251>brother,<s%> should you therefore <S%H5647>serve<s%> me for <S%H2600>nothing?<s%> <S%H5046>Tell<s%> <S%H4909>me,<s%> what will your wages be?"

<S%H3837>Laban<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters.<s%> The <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H1419>elder<s%> was <S%H3812>Leah,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H6996>younger<s%> was <S%H7354>Rachel.<s%>
<S%H3812>Leah<s%>'s <S%H5869>eyes<s%> were <S%H7390>weak,<s%> but <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> was <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> in <S%H3303>form<s%> and <S%H4758>attractive.<s%>

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel.<s%> He <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H5647>serve<s%> you <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> for <S%H7354>Rachel,<s%> your <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H1323>daughter.<s%>"

<S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is <S%H2896>better<s%> that I <S%H5414>give<s%> her to <S%H5414>you,<s%> than that I should give her to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%> Stay with <S%H3427>me.<s%>"

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> for <S%H7354>Rachel.<s%> They <S%H5869>seemed<s%> to him but a <S%H259>few<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> for the love he had for <S%H160>her.<s%>
<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> <S%H3051>"Give<s%> me my <S%H802>wife,<s%> for my <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled,<s%> that I may go in to <S%H935>her.<s%>"
<S%H3837>Laban<s%> gathered <S%H622>together<s%> all the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4960>feast.<s%>
It happened in the <S%H6153>evening,<s%> that he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3812>Leah<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> her to <S%H935>him.<s%> He went in to her.
<S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H2153>Zilpah<s%> his <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> to his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H3812>Leah<s%> for a <S%H8198>handmaid.<s%>

It happened in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H3812>that,<s%> behold, it was Leah. He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> "What is this you have <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H5647>me?<s%> Didn't I serve with you for <S%H7354>Rachel?<s%> Why then have you deceived <S%H7411>me?<s%>"
<S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is not <S%H6213>done<s%> so in our <S%H4725>place,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H6810>younger<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1067>firstborn.<s%>

<S%H4390>Fulfill<s%> the <S%H7620>week<s%> of this <S%H2063>one,<s%> and we will <S%H5414>give<s%> you the other also for the <S%H5656>service<s%> which you will <S%H5647>serve<s%> with me yet <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>"
<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H4390>so,<s%> and fulfilled her <S%H7620>week.<s%> He <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> as <S%H802>wife.<s%>
<S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H1090>Bilhah,<s%> his <S%H8198>handmaid,<s%> to be her <S%H8198>handmaid.<s%>

He went <S%H935>in<s%> also to <S%H7354>Rachel,<s%> and he <S%H157>loved<s%> also <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> more than <S%H3812>Leah,<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> with him yet <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H3812>Leah<s%> was <S%H8130>hated,<s%> and he <S%H6605>opened<s%> her <S%H7358>womb,<s%> but <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> was <S%H6135>barren.<s%>

<S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and she <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H7121>him<s%> <S%H7205>Reuben.<s%> <S%H3588>For<s%> she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>"Because<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H7200>looked<s%> at my <S%H6040>affliction.<s%> <S%H3588>For<s%> now my <S%H376>husband<s%> will love <S%H157>me.<s%>"

She <S%H2029>conceived<s%> <S%H3205>again,<s%> and bore a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H8085>heard<s%> that I am <S%H8130>hated,<s%> he has therefore <S%H5414>given<s%> me this son <S%H8034>also.<s%>" She named <S%H7121>him<s%> <S%H8095>Simeon.<s%>

She conceived <S%H2029>again,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son.<s%> <S%H559>Said,<s%> "Now this <S%H6471>time<s%> will my <S%H376>husband<s%> be <S%H3867>joined<s%> to <S%H3205>me,<s%> because I have borne him <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons.<s%>" Therefore was his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3878>Levi.<s%>

She <S%H2029>conceived<s%> <S%H3205>again,<s%> and bore a <S%H1121>son.<s%> She <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6471>"This<s%> time will I <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>" Therefore she <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H7121>him<s%> <S%H3063>Judah.<s%> Then she <S%H5975>stopped<s%> <S%H3205>bearing.<s%>
